hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 맨체스터 시티 센터 아레나 (Holiday Inn Express Manchester City Centre Arena)
title: 매우 좋음”
content: Walkable distance to city area where all the shops are!

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 맨체스터 시티 센터 아레나 (Holiday Inn Express Manchester City Centre Arena)
title: recommended”
content: Great location and neat & clean hotel. Five stars.

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 맨체스터 시티 센터 아레나 (Holiday Inn Express Manchester City Centre Arena)
title: Breakfast improvement”
content: Very less options in breakfast and for veg options, almost nothing

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 맨체스터 시티 센터 아레나 (Holiday Inn Express Manchester City Centre Arena)
title: 매우 좋음”
content:
Overall the location is great , some staff were really good fewer not to the expectation , house keeping is not so great , no response actually , we tried for the heater , which was not provided after several reminders to them .
There was not much options for vegetarians for the breakfast.

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 맨체스터 시티 센터 아레나 (Holiday Inn Express Manchester City Centre Arena)
title: Not a very good visit this time”
content: Room tired, scrapes on the wall,  broken curtain rail and mattress protector grubby (only discovered this the morning after or would have asked for this to be changed). Fire alarm went off 3 times we were evacuated the 2nd time then after the 3rd time we suspected it had been turned off. Breakfast was shambolic despite booking a time slot, no tables, food not replenished, no teaspoons or sugar and a long queue to get in. We have stayed here before and we had found it satisfactory but will look for somewhere else in future.

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 맨체스터 시티 센터 아레나 (Holiday Inn Express Manchester City Centre Arena)
title: Decent one night stay”
content: Its a nice location close enough to the trains station. Breakfast was good. Staff  friendly. WIFI was good. A no frills hotel overall. Shopping areas very close by. Bars and restaurants all around. recommend.

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 맨체스터 시티 센터 아레나 (Holiday Inn Express Manchester City Centre Arena)
title: 매우 좋음”
content: Good

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 맨체스터 시티 센터 아레나 (Holiday Inn Express Manchester City Centre Arena)
title: Nice Hotel, Friendly Staff, Good Breakfast”
content:
hotel staff is helpful. Their breakfast is excellent opens from 6am, was really helpful for us to concentrate other things in every morning.
You have to walk 15mins if you need to go to Piccadilly Station, for us it was bit far away since we have a pram with a infant.
All in all, a good stay

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 맨체스터 시티 센터 아레나 (Holiday Inn Express Manchester City Centre Arena)
title: Excellent customer service ”
content: The customer service from all the staff was excellent,Thanks alot!

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 맨체스터 시티 센터 아레나 (Holiday Inn Express Manchester City Centre Arena)
title: Great location ”
content: Great location, highly recommended

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 맨체스터 시티 센터 아레나 (Holiday Inn Express Manchester City Centre Arena)
title: Hotel located in the city centre ”
content:
This hotel just around 0.5 miles to Manchester arndale where you can dine and shopping. Primark also just nearby. 

The cleanliness is not as good as my 2017 trip. I can see manpower cut down too. 

Breakfast choices quite ok.
The croissant still taste good. 

They have the vegetarian sausage too!

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 맨체스터 시티 센터 아레나 (Holiday Inn Express Manchester City Centre Arena)
title: 매우 좋음”
content: Great location to explore Manchester’s Northern Quarter and beyond. Coffee shops and bars galore in the vicinity plus very good restaurants

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 맨체스터 시티 센터 아레나 (Holiday Inn Express Manchester City Centre Arena)
title: Great quite location”
content: very convenient

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 맨체스터 시티 센터 아레나 (Holiday Inn Express Manchester City Centre Arena)
title: Basic but perfect! ”
content: Good rooms with simple amenities, has everything you need. Great location and the staff are really helpful. Reduced price parking with the hotel and a great breakfast included in the price!

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 맨체스터 시티 센터 아레나 (Holiday Inn Express Manchester City Centre Arena)
title: 최고”
content: Great hotel, great location, would definitely recommend if your staying in Manchester

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 맨체스터 시티 센터 아레나 (Holiday Inn Express Manchester City Centre Arena)
title: Very nice stay ”
content: Could improve facilities by providing tooth brush and tooth paste already in the room

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 맨체스터 시티 센터 아레나 (Holiday Inn Express Manchester City Centre Arena)
title: Room clean and location convenience”
content:
Hotel is located in City Centre, very convenience. Shopping, eating is easy.  
Room is looked a bit small but is tidy, clean and  bed is comfortable and have good sleep.  Staffs are nice and helpful.  Highly recommend.

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 맨체스터 시티 센터 아레나 (Holiday Inn Express Manchester City Centre Arena)
title: Bad mattress ”
content:
Hi 
I spender £280 for 2 nights unfortunately I have back disc problem and bed mattress was very uncomfortable very low quality I used hotel because reviews and I will sleep nicely but I couldn’t sleep proper. Will never book again such a bad service and waist of money.

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 맨체스터 시티 센터 아레나 (Holiday Inn Express Manchester City Centre Arena)
title: A 4 * hotel”
content:
We found the hotel a bit tucked away, in town, just a short walk away with shops & restaurants. The hotel was very clean & the staff are very acommodating. 

Unfortunately, there wasn't a great deal of food to purchase as an evening snack or meal. We think this was due to covid regulations or staffing problems. We were given 2 options a pizza or a panini. There was a fully equipped bar with familiar drinks on tap & in bottle. 
Televisions on the walls with news channels which were subtitled with no sound with music in the background.

There was a terrific, help yourself, hot breakfast with machines of d.i.y. toast, different coffee's & fruit juices. The hotel bar-lounge-eating area is large and very stylish. There were 2 lifts & stairs to all the 8 floor single/double/triple bedroom accommodation. 

Our room consisted of a very stylish black & white tiled, large door opening to a power-shower. There is a large mirrored tiled wall with fitted wc & sink, which looked brand new but obviously cleaned by professionals. 

Our bedroom was lovely but unfortunately i found the bed was too soft and very easily we could roll off the end. I did find the pillows given were perfect, 1 soft & 1 medium to firm, to accommodate different kinds of sleepers. 

Plenty of tea/coffee with a built-in tray for the kettle to power point which I found great. We found the tv was a bit small for the room but had multi channels provided. There is a large window with no option to be opened as its just plain glass. I did have problems working out the heating, it was very cold during the evening & night. Sadly, we agreed & decided to give up on it. 

But as a overnight stay, its a great hotel. Thankyou so much for the hospitality we had as a loved up couple xxx

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 맨체스터 시티 센터 아레나 (Holiday Inn Express Manchester City Centre Arena)
title: Value for money”
content: The room was clean and you are assured that linens were changed before your check in. Breakfast is nice - continental (buffet). Had an amazing time. Will definitely be back!

title: Welcoming and Relaxing”
content:

title: Modern”
content: The location is slightly north of the cbd. Doesn't take long to walk to the cbd. Staff were friendly and helpful. Room was very modern and new. Breakfast was above average.

title: Nice location to walk around in the city centre and good experience ”
content: This holiday inn express is amongst the best value for money from the ones I have stayed across the world in different continents but the only one thing they could improve is provide some hot food options for their veg guests as there was nothing much apart from cereals ,some fruits and baked beans for vegetarians !!

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 맨체스터 시티 센터 아레나 (Holiday Inn Express Manchester City Centre Arena)
title: Nice hotel, well located, good free breakfast ”
content: The Holiday Inn Express Manchester arena is a nice modern hotel. It it well located, near Victoria station (about 5 minutes walk) and the Northern Quarter. The rooms are fairly new and well presented. The only drawback was the room was very cold as it appears the heating controls have been disabled by management. As such the room was cold for our entire trip. The price also includes free breakfast which was a nice touch.

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 맨체스터 시티 센터 아레나 (Holiday Inn Express Manchester City Centre Arena)

The location is a gem. Nearby have tram station and big shopping malls.
The breakfast provided is good quality and the room is acceptable too. The hotel location is quiet and strategically located in a hidden alley away from road noise.

title: Brief stay - excellent”

Very clean & comfortable rooms - was higher up to avoid any potential city traffic noise.
Convenient city center location for Arndale Center, other retail, restaurants, metro link & Victoria Station trains. Very tasty breakfast. Very professional front desk staff during my brief visit. Highly recommended for short visits.

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 맨체스터 시티 센터 아레나 (Holiday Inn Express Manchester City Centre Arena)
title: Great location.  Nice room.  Breakfast is far too stressful.”
content:
The hotel location, check-in and the room are all excellent.  We slept really well, there were no problems with noise.

Breakfast was just far too busy.  There were people constantly walking right next to our dining table attemptibg to get to the serving area, making our breakfast a truly unmemorable experience. 

My wife didn't enjoy the food itself and my own thoughts are that it could be far better.

In summary, the hotel is in a great location with parking available just across the road - but you may want to consider eating breakfast out, such as at one of the many cafes in the Northern Quarter (e.g. 33 Oldham St, Ezra & Gil).

title: Pleasant stay”
content: was there during recent Xmas holiday. located in the center of Manchester. there's convenience store opposite of the hotel. walking distance to the tram station (shudehill). overall pleasant stay. will definitely stay if I'm traveling to Manchester again the future.

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 맨체스터 시티 센터 아레나 (Holiday Inn Express Manchester City Centre Arena)
title: Pleasant stay”
content:
It was a pleasant stay at the hotel. The location is perfect. It is near to good restaurants/cafes. It is also nearby arndale and other shopping places. Furthermore, the hotel is just minutes away from Shudehill tram station. 
The room is comfortably spacious for UK standard.
The staff are efficient with fast check in and out but they could be a bit friendlier.
The breakfast is free, but i thought the food could be better considering it is Holiday Inn.
And lastly, the hotel should have stated that they are closed on 24th dec at 12pm.

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 맨체스터 시티 센터 아레나 (Holiday Inn Express Manchester City Centre Arena)
title: Very central, nice staff, can walk most places”
content: We would stay again, being able to check in early after long flight from Australia was an absolute bonus. Little bit hard to find when you first arrive but found the people of Manchester very helpful and friendly, we did catch the train then light rail from airport which was alot cheaper than taxi.  We stayed July 2013 and found the rates quite reasonable but the double bed a bit on the small side.

content:
축구 경기를 위해 간단한 백팩으로만 이동하신거라면 추천드리지만, 캐리어와 다양한 짐 그리고 간단한 시설(포트, 드라이기 등) 등을 이용하실 거라면 추천하지 않습니다,,,,

우선 저는 호텔 예약할 때 공간 평형을 꼭 확인하는 편인데,,,
굉장히 협소하고, 침대는 무너질 것 같고, 
커플이나 가족 단위로 이용하기에는 적절하지않은것같아요,,,
급해서 예약하긴 했지만 가격대비 맞지않는 것 같습니다.

title: 맨체스터 중심에서 가성비있는 숙소”
content: 내부가 좀 텅 비어있긴하나 가성비 있게 잘 쉬다갔습니다.

title: 축구를 보러온다면 !”
content: 아주 좋은 위치와 비교적 싼 가격

title: 가성비가 좋습니다”
content:
방 2개 예약했으며, 단점은 형광등이 없습니다
맨체스터 피카다리역까지 도보로 이동하기 편하며, 트램 이용도 편리합니다. 축구 여행오시는분들에게 적합한 숙소입니다.

title: 가성비가 좋습니다”
content:
방 2개 예약했으며, 단점은 형광등이 없습니다
맨체스터 피카다리역까지 도보로 이동하기 편하며, 트램 이용도 편리합니다. 축구 여행오시는분들에게 적합한 숙소입니다.

title: 와이파이 빼고는 좋아요”
content: 방이 어둡긴 해도 낭만도 있고 와이파이 없는거 말고는 좋아요

title: 위치는 좋으나 시설은 그닥”
content: 위치는 최적의 위치에 있으나, 객실내부 와이파이 사용이 유로라는 점이 매우 실망스러움. 그 외에는 모두 괜찮다

title: 1800년대엔 1등했을 숙소”
content: 그러나 2022년엔 와이파이없는 숙소로 악명높지

title: 시내근접”
content:
시내 및 공항에 접근할수 있는 역과 가까우며
주변에 다양한 시설이 존재함
가격 대비 만족도 있는 시설

title: 다시는 안가고 싶어요”
content: 방음이 안되서 옆방소리 다들리고 드라이기 없어서 곤란하고 위치만 괜찮음

title: 가성비 괜찮은 호텔 ”
content:
오래된 건물이라 시설이 많이 낙후 되어있음
시내 중심부라 교통 접근성은 최고
냉장고 없음 물도 안줌

title: 별로임”
content: 바닥은 청소안되있고 방에 먼지는 쌓여있고. 냉장고 에어컨도없음

title: 브리타이나 호텔(맨체스터, 영국)”
content:
1. 장소: 맨체스터 시티 중심가에 위치해서 관광, 쇼핑 하기에는 최적의 장소임. 차이나타운도 가깝고, 맨체스터 시청, 도서관도 가까움.
2. 벨보이: 정말 친절하고 최고임.
3. 숙소: 일단 좁고 비쌈, 오래됨.

title: 위치는 좋으나 ᆢ”
content:
호텔이 기차역도 가깝고 깔끔했다
그러나 바로 옆 밑에 클럽이 있어
늦게까지 쿵쿵거려 잠을 잘수 없었음

title: Good location but old hotel. ”
content:
맨체스터시내 중심에 위치해 있음.
조금 호텔이 오래 되었긴 하나, 가격대비 만족.
호텔복도에서 살짝 오래된 냄새가 나지만 크게 지장을 줄 정도를 아니라고 생각함.
가격이 싸니깐 이해하는 부분.
와이파이 무료로 사용할 수 있었음/

content: 볼거는 위치하나인듯

title: 축구 여행을 위한 분들을 위해”
content:
축구 경기를 위해 간단한 백팩으로만 이동하신거라면 추천드리지만, 캐리어와 다양한 짐 그리고 간단한 시설(포트, 드라이기 등) 등을 이용하실 거라면 추천하지 않습니다,,,,

title: 쏘쏘”
content:
체크인을 한분만 하셔서 줄서서 한참을 기다렸습니다.
공항근처라 위치는 너무 좋았어요. 내부 레스토랑도 늦게까지 운영해서 만족했지만 이게 다였어요

title: 괜찮은 호텔”
content: 다음날 새벽 비행기 이용하느라 묵었는데 직원들 친절하고 깨끗했어요.다만, 큰타월만 있고 세면타월이 없었고요.드라이기는 구비되어 있지않아 따로 얘기해야합니다.로비에 간단한 식사류를 저렴하게 팔기때문에 그 점이 강점인거 같아요

title: 추천”
content: 가깝지만 걸어가려면 시간걸림 깨끗하고 친절함 드라이기 없음

title: Good place to prepare for ex-MAN departure”
content:
The room facilitates pretty much basic ones, somewhat lacks variety but you do not expect miracle from everywhere.

A very nice place to spend your last night to take a very early morning flight.

Staff were helpful at check-in, trying hard to minimize the waiting time for all que.

title: Appreciated ! ”
content: Excellent staffs !

title: Appreciated ! ”
content: Excellent staffs !

title: Good place to prepare for ex-MAN departure”
content:
The room facilitates pretty much basic ones, somewhat lacks variety but you do not expect miracle from everywhere.

A very nice place to spend your last night to take a very early morning flight.

Staff were helpful at check-in, trying hard to minimize the waiting time for all que.

title: 정말 좋은 위치”
content:
위치가 너무 좋아요.
객실 상태는 매트리스랑 침구류가 조금 낡은 점 빼고 대체로 만족스럽습니다.
이비스에  기대하는 수준이 보장되어서 가격 대비 아주 만족스럽습니다.

title: 케임브리지에 단기 관광 최적 숙소”
content: 케임브리지역 바로 앞에 위치하면 10m? 거리의 상가에 다양한 편의시설이 다수 존재합니다. 편의점, 식당, 카페, 베이커리, 푸드트럭, 펍 모두 이용하기 편리하고 룸 컨디션도 가격대비 훌륭한 편입니다. 특히 빠른 엘리베이터 속도에 감동했습니다!

title: 신청하지도 않은 조식을 결제시키는 호텔”
content: 조식을 신청한적도 먹은적도 없는데 체크아웃할 때 갑자기 조식 비용을 청구함. 신청하지 않았다고 아무리 말해도 자기들은 아고다측으로부터 조식을 신청받았다는 말만 반복함. 조식 신청되지 않은 바우처를 보여줘도 본 척도 안함. 먹지도 않은 조식을 결제했는데 영수증도 못준다고 함.  주말 겨우 시간내서 간건데 시간 버리고, 삥뜯기고, 기분만 상해서 옴.

title: 기차역 바로 앞의 호텔”
content: 케임브리지 기차역 바로 앞에 있어요. 주변에 세인즈버리도 있고 좋았어요. 케임브리지 대학가까지는 걸어서 15분~20분 정도여서 걸을 만 했어요. 직원도 친절했고, 방이 넓고 깨끗해요. 조식도 먹을 만 했어요. 추천합니다.

title: 최고의 숙소”
content: 진짜 개좋음 개추천 케임브리지 가면 꼭 예약하세요 가좋아요 ㅠㅠㅠ세상에 넓고 깨끗하고 역하고 30초 거리임

title: 쏘쏘합니다”
content:
일단 트윈베드룸을 이용했는데 냉장고가 없어서 황당..ㅎㅎ 
대신 요청했더니 엑스트라분이 있다고 해서 방에 넣어줬구요,
화장실이나 기타 위생상태는 괜찮았습니다.
조식은 비교적 화려한?편이나,, 맛은 한국인 입맛에는 그저 그렇습니다. 좀 짜구요.
위치는 케임브리지 내에서 여기저기 다니기에 아주 좋고
슈퍼(Saintbury)랑 다우닝컬리지 근처의 펍들과 킹스칼리지 근처랑도 가까워서 위치는 아주 좋습니다.
다만 가격이.. 이 동네가 전체적으로 비싼건지 쎄긴 쎄더라구요~ ㅎ

title: The worst hotel I've ever seen”
content:
Smells terrible, non controlable shower hoss, unkind staff.
I will never go anymore.

title: great location but needs an update”
content: Hugely overpriced.  Great location right next to the river.  Room is bit large but stuffy. Wifi is good, no air conditioner, small hair dryer, no lift, no bottled water provided but various tea bags and small biscuits. Staff at check in was unwelcoming. Limited selection for breakfast: standard offers only bread, cereal, cut fruits, and hot coffee.  Not a particularly pleasant stay. Barely recommendable.

title: Durty and old building”
content:
Please do not go this House Hotel.
Very durty and old building.
The staff is unfriendly, and the carpets are very old and have a lot of mites.  And there is no air conditioning, and there are no windows, so it's very stuffy.  The location has the advantage of being relatively close to cambridge downtown, but it is not easy to recommend.

title: 진짜 추천합니다!!!”
content:
트리플룸에서 4일 간 묶었습니다. 판테온 완전 근처에 있어서 다니기 너무 편했어요. 관광지에 있는 것 치고 시끄러운 것도 없었구요. 
특히 트리플룸은 장기여행객 3명이 캐리어 펴고 지낼 수 있을 정도로 공간이 여유가 있고 화장실은 넓고 수압 빵빵이었습니다. 
조식 먹는 장소에 늘 건식과 음료수 물 그리고 커피기계까지 있어서 따로 간식 사먹을 필요가 없었어요. 진짜 좋습니다. 추천합니다.

title: 아룬델  하우스 호텔”
content: 호텔 위치는 좋았고 캠브리지 구시가지 5분 거리. 강가 옆이었고  저녁에는 호텔에서 외관 조명을 멋있게  해서 호텐 외관이 굿 굿!  객실에서 외부를 볼수 있는 창이 있어  강가를 산책하는 사람들과 거리에 바람에 흔들리는 나무들도 볼수 있어 좋았다. 식사도 가지수는 적지만 필수 메뉴는 다 있었고 과일이 많아 좋았다. 호텔내 레스토랑이 호텔 잔디와 잘 어울어져~ 넘 멋 있어서 주변에서 찾아 올 정도. 식사는 직접안해봐서 맛은 쩝쩝^^ 단점은 두가지 엘리베이터가 없고 방 침대 메트가 좀 오래돼서 안락감은 떨어 지는게 티^^

title: Great purchases”
content: Great housing,  good services, early check in.

title: Excellent”
content: We arrived in the evening and got upgraded to a wonderful serviced apartment style unit with their sister hotel next door. The whole development of the 2 hotels together is very new and clean with excellent facilities, perfect for a family with young children.

title: A Brand New Hotel”
content: It has all the household appliances that you can cook and clean your cloth during the trip. You can take the park-and-ride bus to the town centre.  The only bad experience I had is that the parking lot was full when I checked in but the staff told me there was still free space and asked me to park my car in the hotel's parking but I could not find a space and then the staff refunded me the fee and told me that I could park my car on the street parking for free until next morning.

title: Excellent ”
content: Lovely design, clean and excellent environment. I will go there again.

title: Cosy Staying”
content: The room is very clean and tidy. We spend lot of time staying at room relaxing. The kitchen stuffs are enough for cooking. Staff is nice and location is good. Sainsbury's is just around the corner.

title: Nice place”
content: Good place

title: Luxe apartement& voorzieningen”
content: Prachtige houten vloer, grote ramen met uitzicht op mooie binnenplaats &cocktailbar. Mooi kleurgebruik en fijne materialen. Bed lag iets minder goed.

title: 酒店很新，干净，服务非常棒”
content: 非常好的入住体验，美中不足是离中心有段距离，门口公交不准点，需要留出足够交通时间

title: 非常棒的一次体验 an excellent experience”
content: 有洗衣机，烤箱，冰箱包括配套使用的东西都有，非常齐全！There is a washing machine,an oven, a fridge and many other stuffs with accessories. Comfortable and relaxing!

title: Good stay”

title: Excellent place”
content: Supermarket nearby.  Easy to get to town. Parking nearby.

title: Great place on the outskirts of Cambridge”
content: What a great find. The studio was brilliant. We could make food and drinks easily. Bed was comfortable. Bathroom was spotless. Easy to get into central Cambridge. Supermarket downstairs has everything you could need

title: Great stay”
content:
I really enjoyed stopping at the Turing. The rooms are lovely and well equipped. I swapped rooms as the drains were smelly in my first one and the staff were so helpful. The washing machine in the new one didn’t
Work so
They swapped it swiftly. The reception staff and the maintenance guys were lovely. Would stay here again in a heartbeat.

title: A hidden gem”
content:
My partner and I stayed at Turing Locke initially for 1 night, then extended to 2 nights (as we were so impressed) for a wedding in Longstowe. It's a 30-minute bus journey from Cambridge station (the final stop of U), dropping us right in front of the hotel. It's modern, fresh and surrounded by greeneries. We loved the relaxed and 'free' atmosphere. The room was airy and comfy, and conveniently fitted with high quality kitchen amenities. Perfect for those who opt to make their own food while away. The only minor feedback for improvement is that we noticed some tea stains in the cups (which might be tough to remove in the dishwasher), and the cleanseness of the bathroom (where we found a piece of gum in the shower). 

We'd particularly like to thank Nicki and her colleague (whom we didn't catch her name) for helping us with our last minute extended booking and various enquiries, and all their kind gestures (booking taxi, complimentary breakfast, and room upgrade, etc) - we really appreciate it. Thank you guys for your patience and bright energy - we are very grateful and will definitely be back!

title: Would stay again! ”
content: Loved our stay here! The rooms were better than in the pictures. They were new, spacious, clean and modern rooms.. They also provided great quality linen on the beds. Would highly recommend staying here. Jess the manager and Nicolette on reception were also friendly and extremely helpful. Five stars for Turing Locke!

title: Excellent! Thank you Fabio!”
content:
We loved our stay, and we keep coming back. Thank you to everyone who made our stay wonderful, but especially Fabio at the front desk. 

Thank you so much Fabio! Thank you again for all of your help!

title: Thank you so much Fabio!”
content: Most of the staff members are kind, but Fabio is the best! Thank you again for all of your help!

title: Fabio is the best!”
content:
Fabio at the front desk is the best! Always very kind and helpful. 

Thank you so much Fabio! We truly appreciate all of your help. 

We'll be back! 

Please to Fabio's manager can you give him a promotion? :)

title: You shoud stay in Turing Locke”
content:
Great place for either short or long stay. You’ll have everything you need. There might be slight imperfections, but it’s all secondary things. 
I’d put a TV in front of a bed, not in a kitchen/dining part of a studio. If only I had a balcony.
Everything else-superb

title: Comfortable and friendly stay but away from the action”
content: Very comfortable but away from the action.  Bus ride is handy and about 15-20 minutes from town.  Sainsburys is next door for those who like to cook.  GPS had trouble finding the hotel :)

title: 무난함”
content: My biggest complain is that when I arrived , the front desk guy could clearly see me struggling with three big suitcases. Instead of offering any help, the guy assigned me a room that is furthest from the lift. maybe it's unintentional ( I hope so), but it's the worst experience I ever had at a hotel in the UK.

title: 무난함”
content: They managed to "lose" my flower delivery but left an opened card in my room. It's been two days but no explanation, apology nor compensation. Leaking shower with hair in the drain and a sopping wet floor mat when we first checked in. Shocking

We enjoyed the tv aspect as you could stream from your phone straight to the tv which meant we could easily watch Netflix etc. 10/10 experience

title: Comfortable and friendly stay but away from the action”
content: Very comfortable but away from the action.  Bus ride is handy and about 15-20 minutes from town.  Sainsburys is next door for those who like to cook.  GPS had trouble finding the hotel :)

title: Missing  items at the luggage storage ”
content:
I called the reception after I realised that I missed one item from the luggage storage. Though I was told it was still there, it wasn’t when my friend who kindly helped me collect it.

My room was on the ground floor. Access to the room requires a few steps from the bar area. Though it is just a few steps, it is inconvenient with heavy luggage, and for elderly who can’t walk well. Would be better if the hotel could let us know beforehand.

title: 매우 좋음”
content: Having been a regular visitor to this hotel in its previous guises this was the first time we had seen it dressed as a ‘Graduate’… Very obviously in American chain and first impressions designed for American visitors… But the location of the hotel is still first-class, Cambridge is always wonderful, despite the current difficulties the staff tried the best… So if you want to stay in one of the best cities in the world and like a pseudo Disney take on Ye Olde British Hotel give it a whirl

title: It will be great!”
content: The hotel was only open for a week, so some of the facilities were not available (pool/fitness) and there was still obvious signs of work. That said, it is a beautiful (quirky) hotel in a fabulous location, right on the river, and centrally located for all of Cambridge's attractions

title: amazing！”
content: verrrrrry goooooood！

title: 我會願意再回去住一次”
content: 非常好的地點，就在康禾的旁邊，房間整齊漂亮，唯一美中不足的是浴室洗澡的水下不去，會積水，如果能改善的話，那就太完美了

title: Poor, poor”
content:
Hotel is in a great location and is nicely decorated. The main challenge is a lack of trained staff. 
While staying for two nights we had to re check in on the second day. Took over twenty minutes as I had to clear the incidentals from the first day. Found that extra items had been allocated to our bill without any evidence of these items having been purchased. It also transpired that another food item had been signed to out room although had not been charged to our bill. 
A service charge was automatically added to all bills.  Assume the staff do not get these. 
Lesson - always check the bill! 
Lack of staff in the breakfast area and in the main bar at night. 
No television anywhere to collectively watch sports events. 
Overall a shame that poor staffing / management bring down what could be a very good hotel.

title: It will be great!”
content: The hotel was only open for a week, so some of the facilities were not available (pool/fitness) and there was still obvious signs of work. That said, it is a beautiful (quirky) hotel in a fabulous location, right on the river, and centrally located for all of Cambridge's attractions

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 캠브리지 (Holiday Inn Express Cambridge)
title: Location ok if you drive”
content: about right service..... location so so but ok if you drive

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 캠브리지 (Holiday Inn Express Cambridge)
title: Remote but value for money”
content: Very pleasant stay although location is remote but not a big issue if you have own transportation. Free parking is avilable. Staff are in general helpful and friendly. Room size is a bit small for family of 4.

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 캠브리지 (Holiday Inn Express Cambridge)
title: Lovely hotel but a bit far from town”
content: I stayed at this hotel during spring season. Cheap, comfortable, cozy, & metropolitan hotel just for solo traveller like me. It is good for small family. The drawbacks are a bit far from town centre. But getting taxi using cam cab is so easy. Second day, I got problem with accessed room key. Wifi is only available in the lobby but not in room.

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 캠브리지 (Holiday Inn Express Cambridge)
title: Comfortable Room nice hotel”
content:
Although the hotel is not in the heart of Cambridge is is a quiet retreat that is not too far from the centre.  It only took us 10 minutes to be at the centre of the city and to be at the  Colleges at the heart of the city.
The breakfast was well organised and covered the basics for all customers.  The staff were friendly and helpful.  The room was adequate though  there could have been more coffee and tea available in the room.

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 캠브리지 (Holiday Inn Express Cambridge)
title: Great value for money”
content: Great value for money. Breakfast not great but ok given price paid overall

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 캠브리지 (Holiday Inn Express Cambridge)
title: Very helpful service”
content: Reasonable value for Cambridge, a little out of the way

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 캠브리지 (Holiday Inn Express Cambridge)
title: what you would expect”
content:
it does its job, we only needed a bed for a night, and hotels in cambridge can be expensive. the hotel was affordable, clean, quiet and the staff was friendly. if you just want a base then stay here but if your after some luxury then keep looking!
if your a menber of david lloyd then take your gym kit because theres one next door!

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 캠브리지 (Holiday Inn Express Cambridge)
title: Simple & comfortable”
content: What it says on the tin. This is a fairly new chain hotel with reasonably sized functional rooms, but more of a business hotel than a base for visiting the city at your leisure. In the case of having to go there because other hotels are full, it is about 20 minutes from the centre by cab and is close to the river.

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 캠브리지 (Holiday Inn Express Cambridge)
title: 感覺很好，會再來也”
content: 距離市中心稍遠，但位置較清靜，隔音不太好，但入住的客人都自覺，不會造成太大搔擾，休息得很舒服。房間整潔，地方寬敞，只是洗手間中間有條橙色繩吊住，行過搖動它就會立即響警報，不知有什麼用，關掉床頭有個制就好了。早餐非常好味，價錢合宜，是不錯的。

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 캠브리지 (Holiday Inn Express Cambridge)
title: 比較適合學生族群的飯店”
content: 這次出差住在holiday inn express cambridge有點不太適當，因為這裡靠近劍橋，比較適合來劍橋報到的學生居住。但是這裡價位很便宜，對於想要節省經費的商務人士也是一個可參考的飯店。得要自己舖床單這件事情，如果不能接受，就請找其他家旅館吧。

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 캠브리지 (Holiday Inn Express Cambridge)
title: Normal”
content: 适合自驾，房间太小，早餐一般，房间灯太少，不亮。

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 캠브리지 (Holiday Inn Express Cambridge)
title: 要经济实惠自驾的话选这里”
content: 所有东西都是非常的基本，早餐选择少，房间补充不及时，第二天包括毛巾，餐巾纸都没有补充及更换。停车方便，去市中心开车10分钟。后院有小鹿和兔子出没小朋友很开心。

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 캠브리지 (Holiday Inn Express Cambridge)
title: 性價比高”
content: 寬敞，但浴室沒有乾濕分離。cp值高。如果是開車的人可以考慮。

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 캠브리지 (Holiday Inn Express Cambridge)
title: Lovely hotel but a bit far from town”
content: I stayed at this hotel during spring season. Cheap, comfortable, cozy, & metropolitan hotel just for solo traveller like me. It is good for small family. The drawbacks are a bit far from town centre. But getting taxi using cam cab is so easy. Second day, I got problem with accessed room key. Wifi is only available in the lobby but not in room.

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 캠브리지 (Holiday Inn Express Cambridge)
title: what you would expect”
content:
it does its job, we only needed a bed for a night, and hotels in cambridge can be expensive. the hotel was affordable, clean, quiet and the staff was friendly. if you just want a base then stay here but if your after some luxury then keep looking!
if your a menber of david lloyd then take your gym kit because theres one next door!

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 캠브리지 (Holiday Inn Express Cambridge)
title: Simple & comfortable”
content: What it says on the tin. This is a fairly new chain hotel with reasonably sized functional rooms, but more of a business hotel than a base for visiting the city at your leisure. In the case of having to go there because other hotels are full, it is about 20 minutes from the centre by cab and is close to the river.

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 캠브리지 (Holiday Inn Express Cambridge)
title: Remote but value for money”
content: Very pleasant stay although location is remote but not a big issue if you have own transportation. Free parking is avilable. Staff are in general helpful and friendly. Room size is a bit small for family of 4.

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 캠브리지 (Holiday Inn Express Cambridge)
title: poor breakfast”
content: Average

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 캠브리지 (Holiday Inn Express Cambridge)
title: Not nice”
content: Poor

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 캠브리지 (Holiday Inn Express Cambridge)
title: hideous breakfast ”
content: The breakfast was not worth the money most of the popular items were unavailable like sausages hash browns etc and the scrambled egg was like slop. Had to wait for tables as all of them were so dirty .

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 캠브리지 (Holiday Inn Express Cambridge)
title: 感覺很好，會再來也”
content: 距離市中心稍遠，但位置較清靜，隔音不太好，但入住的客人都自覺，不會造成太大搔擾，休息得很舒服。房間整潔，地方寬敞，只是洗手間中間有條橙色繩吊住，行過搖動它就會立即響警報，不知有什麼用，關掉床頭有個制就好了。早餐非常好味，價錢合宜，是不錯的。

title: Satisfied with the overall”
content: Visit during winter, and room heater is not function well.   There is a lot of parking lots in front of hotel, and  remember to pay the parking fees.  Hotel location is quite far from the town, however, i like to stay here since here having a quiet environment.

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 캠브리지 (Holiday Inn Express Cambridge)
title: Nice Stay but Breakfast Needed to Improve”
content: The hotel is good. The room is comfortable. The only weakness here is breakfast. Not variety of selection. Cheap breads. Nothing tasty.

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 캠브리지 (Holiday Inn Express Cambridge)
title: Free carpark”
content: Have to drive , nice room

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 캠브리지 (Holiday Inn Express Cambridge)
title: Comfortable, clean and welcoming ”
content:
We enjoyed our 2 night stay here, having brought our bikes with us to explore Cambridge. 
The hotel was comfy, with good, basic facilities- powerful shower, decent beds etc. 
Breakfast buffet was self-serve and plentiful- although you had to time it right to get all the hot options at one go - scrambled egg, bacon, sausages and baked beans, plus the toasters had minds of their own!  The staff worked hard to keep things stocked up and clear tables.
Being beside a cycle path, about 15 mins from the city centre, was a big plus for us. We didn’t use our car once we’d arrived, and parking was free for hotel guests. Driving in Cambridge definitely not recommended, but bikes are an asset!
Staff were great and all went smoothly. Would definitely book again.
(Perhaps the voice in the lift might have cheered up by then. She sounded so depressed when she told us the doors were closing...)

hotel_name: 홀리데이 인 익스프레스 캠브리지 (Holiday Inn Express Cambridge)
title: Business Travel”
content: Good complex, nice clean and has all the amenities you need for a traveller.

title: 최고”
content: Room was nice and clean. Location was very good as right next to train station and paying car park available. Swimming pool and jacuzzi a bit cold. Pastries were really nice for breakfast. Overall a good place to stay

title: Nice staff and service”
content: The lady who have black hair with black glasses at the accounter is really helpful, and friendly , I am very appreciated her service.

title: Not bad”
content: It’s clean. But transport not quite convenient as the bus is once per hour during holidays. There is parking but not free of charge. Price reasonable.

title: New hotel with good services”
content: Newly built hotel near by train station, room is nice and spacious and good breakfast provided, in overall, valued for money

title: Nice stay”
content:
Pros: Clean room, lovely swimming pool and sauna, great breakfast, friendly staff 

Cons: A bit far from city centre but located just next to station

title: Nice and clean”
content: Staff are friendly and helpful. Room is spacious and enough for family with young kids. A swimming pool with sauna. Close to Cambridge North station and bus stop to the city centre.

title: Weekend festival event”
content: Lovely modern hotel with good facilities and nice comfortable bedrooms. Bathrooms very nice also. Service a bit slow at times and a little disorganized but it was very busy due to the Cambridge Club festival. Staff very helpful.

title: Beautiful hotel!”
content: I only stayed for one night but the hotel was clean, modern and the staff were extremely polite and helpful. I highly recommend the buffet breakfast in the morning and the evening meal was also delicious! The room was impeccable and bed was very comfortable. Highly recommend!

title: Very cooperate but friendly ”
content: Rooms very plain, but clean.Would have liked bottles of water in the room.

title: おしゃれで快適なホテル”
content: ケンブリッジノース駅と、かなりの広さがある駐車場に隣接しているため、列車でも車でもアクセスが便利なホテル。ロビー、部屋とも清潔かつ快適で、スタッフはとても親切でフレンドリー。朝食もかなり美味しくてよかった。今回は仕事都合で1泊しか出来なかったが、連泊したくなるホテル。かなりおすすめです。

title: Short stay”
content: Had a lovely time at this hotel. Polite staff and a friendly welcome. Only issue was how the pool was treated by children - always packed and there was not even a side lane for length swimming. Otherwise would recommend, easy access to Cambridge!

title: Exceptional ”
content: Really nice hotel. Everything was perfect. A little annoying that it doesn’t have free parking. But apart from that everything else was class.

title: Nice clean hotel at reasonable price”
content: We stayed for one night and would definitely stay again. The room was clean and so quiet considering it is right next to the train station. Air conditioning was good and very responsive when temp changed. Beautiful bathroom and the waterfall style shower was a treat.  Only small negative was the evening meal considering the price, the duck was a bit dry and the potato undercooked. Staff were attentive. Parking was pain via a separate app but was easy enough.

title: Clean Hotel”
content: It's clean hotel. I like breakfast here.

title: Nice hotel, small but nice pool and gym. Decent breakfast and coffee. ”
content: Recommended.
